collection.name: Tonari ni Kanojo no Iru Shiawase

name: Tonari ni Kanojo no Iru Shiawase: Summer Surprise
storyline: On a hot day reminiscent of summer vacation, Koume was hanging out as usual at her osananajimi Gorou’s place. Over the course of the summer, their sugar-sweet relationship unexpectedly turns into burning love.
summary: On a hot day reminiscent of summer vacation, Koume was hanging out as usual at her osananajimi Gorou’s place. Over the course of the summer, their sugar-sweet relationship unexpectedly turns into burning love.
